game.name: Train Simulator: Ringbahn Berlin Circle
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Travel around the capital of Germany in style with this detailed recreation of Ringbahn Berlin Circle for Train Simulator Classic from developer VirtualTracks.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Travel around the capital of Germany in style with this detailed recreation of Ringbahn Berlin Circle for Train Simulator Classic from developer VirtualTracks.
